trans-unit.source: The 2009-07-17 version of the Azure storage services includes these changes:
trans-unit.target: The 2009-07-17 version of the Azure storage services includes these changes:

trans-unit.source: A root or default container that permits blobs to reside at the top level of the storage account hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: A root or default container that permits blobs to reside at the top level of the storage account hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="6ec9ec4e-1758-4515-92b4-a85d4f27cf05" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Working with the Root Container</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="6ec9ec4e-1758-4515-92b4-a85d4f27cf05" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Working with the Root Container</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Enhancements to the <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List</link> operation for updating blobs.
trans-unit.target: Enhancements to the <link xlink:href="c864893e-d758-475a-b419-af0c60dd2569" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Block List</link> operation for updating blobs.

trans-unit.source: Delegated access to containers and blobs, via shared access signatures and container-level access policies.
trans-unit.target: Delegated access to containers and blobs, via shared access signatures and container-level access policies.

trans-unit.source: See <legacyLink xlink:href="c30f3d25-67a0-47b4-a05e-afee4126c7c8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Manage Access to Azure Storage Resources</legacyLink> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <legacyLink xlink:href="c30f3d25-67a0-47b4-a05e-afee4126c7c8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Manage Access to Azure Storage Resources</legacyLink> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Thirty-second server timeouts for the <link xlink:href="1a1d2a8e-de2b-4fa8-9d6d-582998a26a4f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Containers</link>, <link xlink:href="fa4760a6-5343-4aa1-b484-df823ce817e7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Blobs</link>, <link xlink:href="c7f6a4d1-65e8-4375-974a-d04d6e934bae" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Queues</link>, <link xlink:href="7010b048-a7cb-4c3a-b45e-99debe1c9f70" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Query Tables</link>, and <link xlink:href="8cfef6f9-eb7f-40f0-9016-dff44d36b6e1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Query Entities</link> operations.
trans-unit.target: Thirty-second server timeouts for the <link xlink:href="1a1d2a8e-de2b-4fa8-9d6d-582998a26a4f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Containers</link>, <link xlink:href="fa4760a6-5343-4aa1-b484-df823ce817e7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Blobs</link>, <link xlink:href="c7f6a4d1-65e8-4375-974a-d04d6e934bae" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Queues</link>, <link xlink:href="7010b048-a7cb-4c3a-b45e-99debe1c9f70" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Query Tables</link>, and <link xlink:href="8cfef6f9-eb7f-40f0-9016-dff44d36b6e1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Query Entities</link> operations.

trans-unit.source: A request against the Blob service may specify only a single conditional header.
trans-unit.target: A request against the Blob service may specify only a single conditional header.

trans-unit.source: If a request specifies both the <parameterReference>If-None-Match</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>If-Modified-Since</parameterReference> headers, the request is evaluated based on the criteria specified in <parameterReference>If-None-Match</parameterReference>.
trans-unit.target: If a request specifies both the <parameterReference>If-None-Match</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>If-Modified-Since</parameterReference> headers, the request is evaluated based on the criteria specified in <parameterReference>If-None-Match</parameterReference>.

trans-unit.source: If a request specifies both the <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>If-Unmodified-Since</parameterReference> headers, the request is evaluated based on the criteria specified in <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference>.
trans-unit.target: If a request specifies both the <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>If-Unmodified-Since</parameterReference> headers, the request is evaluated based on the criteria specified in <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference>.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Service Operations</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="36087161-9e7c-47e4-904c-3392cc35a8e9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying Conditional Headers for Blob Service Operations</link> for more information.
